```{r ,eval=TRUE}
library(gpuRandom)
library(gpuR)
library(data.table)
library('geostatsp')
data('swissRain')
swissRain$sqrtY = sqrt(swissRain$rain)
swissRain$elevation = extract(swissAltitude, swissRain)

params = expand.grid(
  range = c(25, 30, 35, 40, 60, 70, 80, 100, 110, 120, 130, 140, 150, 170, 180, 190, 200, 220, 250)*1000,
  shape = c(0.1, 0.3, 0.5, 1, 1.5, 2, 2.5, 3, 4),
  anisoRatio = seq(1, 15,len=10),
  anisoAngleDegrees = seq(25,45, len=10),
  nugget = seq(0, 2,len=5)
)

cilevel=0.95
data=swissRain
formula=sqrtY~ elevation
coordinates=swissRain@coords
paramToEstimate = c("range")
params=params # CPU matrix for now, users need to provide proper parameters given their specific need
BoxCox = seq(0,2,len=8)
type = "double"
reml=FALSE
minustwotimes=FALSE
NparamPerIter=400
Nglobal=c(128,64)
Nlocal=c(16,16)
NlocalCache=2800
verbose=FALSE


```
